entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.

text:
Q: How should I wash & dry clothes/towels/bed linen, if someone in my household is a suspected or confirmed #COVIDー19 patient?
✅Wash patient's clothes, etc. separately
✅Wear gloves before handling them
✅Never carry soiled linen against your body

Read 👇 for more information: https://t.co/bt1573vtib
